title: 820-00165 HDA_SDOUT/_R Shorted; CPU?
message:
Working on an 820-00165 2017 that I believe has a CPU fault causing no audio. Checked all the common issues for no audio, but found HDA_SDOUT shorted (.000) at J9500. Since this comes from the CPU, I suspect a CPU fault and nowhere else to go. Removed R1313 and found HDA_SDOUT_R shorted to ground, which goes to CPU.

Is this one done?

title: 820-00165 HDA_SDOUT/_R Shorted; CPU?
message:
If pure short, should be bad PCH.
But nothing to lose if heat it with quality flux.
Just in case, may still be some accumulated crap.
